Retina type 7 cone bipolar cell.Title: Immunocytochemical identification of cone bipolar cells in the rat retina
Retina type 7 cone bipolar cell.EditorialNote: Pub Med ID was incorrect in spreadsheet;  check with Mihail to make sure article correct
Retina type 7 cone bipolar cell.Definition: Type 7 and type 8  are diffuse CBs with their axonal terminal systems in the inner part of the IPL. Type 7 stratifies in strata 3 and 4....Both cell types (type 7 and type 8) have slender cell bodies.
